casebody.data:
Dayton Bar Association v. Timen.

[Cite as Dayton Bar Assn. v. Timen (1980), 62 Ohio St. 2d 357.]

(D.D. No. 80-9 Decided June 18, 1980.) *359Mr. Leo F. Krebs and Mr. Dale E. Creech, Jr., for relator. Mr. William J. Abraham and Mr. Barry D. Levy, for respondent. Per Curiam.

After an examination and review of the record in this cause, this court concurs with the findings of fact *360and recommendation of the board of commissioners, and orders a public reprimand to be issued against respondent, Elmer G. Timen.

Judgment accordingly.

Celebrezze, C. J., Herbert, W. Brown, P. Brown, Sweeney, Locher and Holmes, JJ., concur.
